name: Brawlhalla
description: Brawlhalla is an epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or locally. And it's free! Join casual free-for-alls, queue for ranked matches, or make a custom room with your friends. Millions of players. Frequent updates. Over forty unique legends. Come fight for glory in the halls of Valhalla!
minimum_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space
